scripts.substreams:prepare: yarn substreams:protogen && yarn substreams:build && yarn substreams:package
scripts.test: substreams pack ./substreams.yaml && substreams run -e mainnet.eth.streamingfast.io:443 substreams.yaml graph_out --start-block 17160908 --stop-block +20
scripts.test-wb: substreams protogen ./substreams.yaml --exclude-paths='sf/substreams,google' && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && substreams pack ./substreams.yaml && substreams run -e mainnet.eth.streamingfast.io:443 substreams.yaml graph_out --start-block 17160908 --stop-block +20
